entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:25 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:25 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
